name: Lotusden Halfling
other_active_abilities: Children of the Woods: You know the Druidcraft Cantrip. At 3rd level, you can cast the Entangle spell once per long rest. At 5th level, you can cast Spike Growth once per long rest. Wisdom is your spellcasting ability for these spells.
Timberwalk: Ability checks made to track you are at disadvantage and you can move through difficult terrain made of non-magical plants and overgrowth without expending extra movement.
